title: Red Dead Online: Frontier Pursuits Out Now
headline: Red Dead Online: Frontier Pursuits Out Now
subtitle: New Bounty Hunter, Trader and Collector Specialist Roles and More
content:
The Red Dead Online: Frontier Pursuits update is here, featuring three new Specialist Roles that you can play now: Bounty Hunter, Trader and Collector.

Each Specialist Role comes with their own unique paths and activities to help you forge new directions and carve out a life for yourself on the frontier.

Ultimate Edition owners also get new ongoing benefits with this latest update.

Learn more including how to unlock select Roles for free jumping into Red Dead Online today.
